title: Your Furry Friends Are Welcome Here!!!
posting_body: Arbor Pointe Apartments offers incredible amenities such as a heated outdoor swimming pool, outdoor playground, resident clubhouse, and state-of-the-art fitness center.
In addition, the community also has stunning views of Mt. Rainier and is conveniently located in a quiet, residential neighborhood in Lakewood.
The community is within close proximity to Pierce College, Steilacoom, Dupont, I-5, Lakewood Town Center, and many parks where residents frequently enjoy walking their four-legged friends.
Call to schedule your tour today and see why you'll love calling Arbor Pointe Apartments home.
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up to date information!
